document_data.mainbody:
Jabarl the Orc-Biter was a member of the Stone-Cold Reavers, a group of reckless adventurers who made their living sometimes as sellswords and sometimes as brigands.
Jabarl was a rugged, ill-tempered thug who intimidated people to get what he wanted. If that didnt work, he resorted to brute force. Jabarl liked to take care of horses, however, which could calm his violent nature.
Jabarl had a criminal past but always managed to avoid getting caught for his crimes. With the Stone-Cold Reavers he tried to steal the presumed treasure hoard of the young white dragon Cryovain from its lair, Icespire Hold. However, Cryovain hadnt amassed any treasure yet.
